name: Audacy
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: entercom
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Audacy is your new audio home for the music, news and sports that matter to you. It's all here.
• Discover music for every moment from hundreds of radio stations and genres
• Get news that hits home from local radio stations and trusted national sources
• Listen to sports talk radio, interviews and team updates by local insiders and top personalities

 Audacy is home to the top live and local radio stations and you can listen for free.
• Music Stations: A variety of pop, country, classic rock, alternative, R&B, dance, EDM, and Spanish stations to fit your mood
• News and Talk Radio: The largest selection of news and talk radio stations including CNN, Fox News Radio, and CBS News Radio 
• Live Sports Talk: Live and local sports talk radio to follow your favorite teams and league coverage on CBS Sports Radio

 Stay connected to your favorites and discover more!
• Stations for Every Taste: 500+ live music, news, sports, talk, and comedy AM/FM stations
